name: Glime - Car-Defense Game with Potions
description:
What is Glime? Glime is about mixing colorful concoctions that help you defend your car car from evil monsters. Mix different herbs and spices together to fend off the horde and escape unscathed. After all, how else are you going to sell your potion without a car and your life?
